identity.mission: Create a high-end CA Automation Platform that feels like a powerful, precision tool, not a generic SaaS.
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with digital fluidity.
Emotion First: The user should feel RELIEF and MASTERY.
Content is King: Data density is beautiful if organized correctly.
Contrast: Use sharp contrasts to guide attention in complex forms.

headings.usage: Used for all page titles, section headers, and data metrics. Gives a technical, authoritative feel.

body.usage: Used for all paragraphs, labels, and table data. Optimized for readability at small sizes.

mono.usage: Used for financial values in grids, transaction IDs, and code-like elements.

dashboard_grid.rules: Use col-span-X classes to create asymmetry. Key metrics take 3-4 cols, charts take 6-8 cols.

layout_strategy.density: High density for data tables, spacious for marketing/landing pages.

cards.style: Flat with 1px border. No heavy shadows. Subtle hover lift.
cards.classes: bg-card border-border border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all duration-200

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium shadow-sm active:scale-95 transition-transform
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium

inputs.style: Clean, minimal borders. Focus ring should be sharp.
inputs.classes: bg-background border-input ring-offset-background focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2

status_badges.style: Pill shaped, subtle background, solid text.

noise_overlay.description: Use a subtle noise texture on dark backgrounds to prevent banding and add 'paper' feel.
noise_overlay.css: background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky headers or modal overlays. Backdrop-blur-md.

images.description: Minimalist workspace with laptop and coffee, conveying focus.
Close up of calculator and pen, representing traditional accounting tools.

icons.size: w-4 h-4 for UI, w-5 h-5 for nav, w-8 h-8 for features

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use gradients for backgrounds unless covered by a noise texture.
Ensure high contrast for all text (WCAG AA).
All interactive elements MUST have a data-testid attribute.
Date pickers must use the Shadcn Calendar component.
Do not center-align the main app container.
Use 'grid-cols-subgrid' if nesting grids to maintain alignment.

page_specifics.dashboard: Use a Bento Grid layout. Prioritize 'Action Required' cards (e.g., pending filings).
page_specifics.itr_filing: Use a Step-by-Step wizard layout. Clear progress indicators.
page_specifics.reports: Use high-density tables with sticky headers. Allow column resizing if possible.

anti_patterns: No generic 'Welcome, User' headers without context.
No huge empty states - provide 'Get Started' actions instead.
No default scrollbars - use custom slim scrollbars.
